function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Patient arrival inside the system may introduce contagious individuals into the environment.","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases within the facility, leading to potential outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Implement health screening measures at entry points to identify and isolate contagious individuals.","Technologies":"Health screening devices, temperature scanners, and symptom questionnaires.","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, staff, and visitors within the facility.","Owner":"Facility management, healthcare providers, and regulatory authorities."},{"Description":"Queue and waiting areas may facilitate close contact between individuals, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Facilitation of disease transmission due to close proximity and prolonged exposure in crowded areas.","Mitigation":"Design and enforce social distancing measures in queue areas, and implement efficient queue management strategies to minimize wait times.","Technologies":"Queue management systems, signage for social distancing, and automated queue monitoring.","People":"Patients, staff, and visitors waiting in queue areas.","Owner":"Facility management, operations team, and queue management personnel."},{"Description":"Inoculation and treatment phases may lead to potential exposure to contaminated materials or infected individuals.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission during medical procedures and treatments.","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to infection control protocols, use of personal protective equipment (PPE), and regular disinfection of medical equipment and treatment areas.","Technologies":"Medical-grade PPE, disinfection equipment, and automated disinfection systems.","People":"Healthcare providers, patients receiving treatment, and support staff in treatment areas.","Owner":"Healthcare facility management, infection control team, and medical staff."}]}
